b"@Jake_Hope Complex and contentious. That's what keeps so many people from tackling it. We like simple and easy! #YAtakeover"
b"@HowlingReviews People ask what's appropriate in YA literature. I think if it happens to readers, it's appropriate and needed. #YAtakeover"
b"@Marsianomo I speak at a lot of suicide/bullying conferences & that's my message. I'm no expert, I just spoke honestly. #YAtakeover"
b"@sampaynewriter I think a lot of people self-censor for fear of being censored. It's the fear that hurts alot of truth in books. #YAtakeover"
b'@HowlingReviews Great question. Simple answer: because it happens in real life. People need to know it can be discussed. #YAtakeover'
b"@Marsianomo We let schools do it for free. For parents, it's so powerful to see students taking it seriously. #YAtakeover"
b'@HowlingReviews Plenty of people were very afraid to read it, but then found it helped them understand things. You never know! #YAtakeover'
b"@_babblebooks A lot of people ask if it's safe/okay to read book after their personal experience. They'll know when it's time. #YAtakeover"
b"@HowlingReviews It's been used in schools for a long time. A few have even done it as a play. Very powerful. #YAtakeover"
b'@sampaynewriter Every scene some people think is "too much" is other peoples favorite scene for that reason. #YAtakeover'
b"@HowlingReviews The success has made me more self-conscious, so I'm much slower, but it hasn't impacted what I write. #YAtakeover"
b'@_babblebooks Understood. I have my "hard read books". Usually glad I read them. But still hard. #YAtakeover'
b"@sampaynewriter I LOVE Perks. Thankfully, didn't read it until after 13RW came out. Now, the author's a friend! #bragging #YAtakeover"
b'@HowlingReviews Not as much as I expected. It has dealt with a good share, though. Still does, from time to time. #YAtakeover'
b"@HowlingReviews And honestly, I didn't think 13RW would be a big hit! Maybe there was freedom in that. #YAtakeover"
b'@sampaynewriter That was something I tried very hard to do. Thank you. I think we owe people who deal with it not to shy away. #YAtakeover'
b"@HowlingReviews It's usually escapism for me, too, which is why coming up with 13RW was very unique for me. #YAtakeover"
b'@HowlingReviews Certain scenes that I knew could get it banned, like the hot tub scene, I had to force myself to just be honest. #YAtakeover'
b'@HowlingReviews I knew that would be where most of the suspense came from. #YAtakeover'
b"@HowlingReviews And truthfully, I never thought of that! But I'm going to pretend I did because it sounds smart! #YAtakeover"
b'@HowlingReviews Great point. I think she also needed that separation to be honest. Just like we do when reading sometimes. #YAtakeover'
b'@Jake_Hope There is, but all you can do is write as honestly as possible. #YAtakeover'
b"@sampaynewriter That's a HUGE compliment. Thank you! #YAtakeover"
b'@Marsianomo Exactly! #YAtakeover'
b'@HowlingReviews It was like a puzzle writing that way. Made it fun! I spent yrs trying to find the right story for that style. #YAtakeover'
b"@Marsianomo Thankfully, I do think it's getting better. That's why we need to keep pushing to open the conversation! #YAtakeover"
b"@Jake_Hope Honestly, I'm glad I didn't even think of that when writing the book. True, but would've scared me! #YAtakeover"
b'@Marsianomo I love when schools use it because it always opens up needed discussion. The power of books! #YAtakeover'
b"@Marsianomo Exactly! Some read it because it's the safest way they know to talk about it. #YAtakeover"
b'@HowlingReviews I think writing it as a suspense novel made it so people who don\'t think they like "sad" books still got it. #YAtakeover'
b'@HowlingReviews The inspiration was personal, but I tried to focus only on telling a good story to keep it intense. #YAtakeover'
b'@Marsianomo After writing the book, I found out so many more people have close connections to it than we think. #YAtakeover'
b'@HowlingReviews I was inspired to write 13RW after a close friend attempted suicide in high school. #YAtakeover'
